summary: Created a professional countdown timer component (CountdownTimer.tsx) with elegant styling including gradients, animations, and responsive design. The countdown displays days, hours, minutes, and seconds until February 1st, 2025 at 00:00 (midnight). Added the countdown timer to all three main pages (home, candidats, classement) positioned prominently below the header sections. The timer automatically disappears when the target date is reached. The component features professional Figma-style design with glassmorphism effects, gradient backgrounds, animated seconds counter, and proper spacing for mobile and desktop views.
current_status: Countdown timer successfully implemented and integrated across all main pages. The timer will count down to February 1st, 2025 00:00 and automatically hide on that date. All styling is professional and responsive. Ready for deployment.
